relation: A Water-type attack. Stronger than Bubble. Many Water-type Pokémon learn this move.
Squirts water to attack the foe.
The foe is struck with a lot of water expelled forcibly from the mouth.
Squirts water to attack the target.
The foe is blasted with a forceful shot of water.
The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.
The enemy is blasted with a forceful shot of water.
pageTitle: Difference between revisions of "Water Gun (move)" - Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia
textBeforeTable: Description Water Gun inflicts damage and has no secondary effect.
